item.title: What Did I Learn at Codemotion Berlin 2017
item.description: Hi, everyone! As you noticed, I post a new blog post about the development of an interactive ToDo list regularly, every five days. But today I am going to tell you about the international IT-conference Codemotion, that I have attended on 12-13. October in Berlin. There were a lot of informative and motivational topics, that can inspire everyone, who are interested or work in IT-branch. All talks occurred in four different spaces and referred by the topic of the sessions.
